en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_INFO: If you check more roles than the number given, they will be selected at random
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_TYPE_MAIN_TRAITOR_COUN: Number of traitors (humans who side with the Wolves)
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_TYPE_MAIN_WOLF_PUP_COU: Number of Wolf pups (replace fallen Wolves)
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_TYPE_MAIN_VILLAGER_COU: Chance for each villager to have a job
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_TYPE_MAIN_AVATAR_CHANC: Chance for an Avatar to be present
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_GUARDIAN_ANGELS: Amount of dead villagers who become Guardian Angels
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_GHOSTS: Amount of dead villagers who become Ghosts
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_SPECTERS: Amount of dead wolves / traitors who become Specters
en.NALES_CONFIG_AMOGUS_MODE: Alternate mode (no night, kill as humans, reports)
en.NALES_CONFIG_DROP_ITEMS_AVAILABLE: Items (except bullets) can be dropped (hold Interact 1 second)
en.NALES_CONFIG_WOLVES_CAN_USE_ITEMS: Items usables in wolf form (except potions)
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_CONFIG_DECEIVER_FLATUL: Deceiver: can add Flatulence in meeting
en.NALES_CONFIG_ROLE_CONFIG_LOVER_WOLF: Lover Wolf replaces Villager instead of Wolf
en.NALES_SETTING_DISABLE_LIVING_VOICES_WHEN: Disable living player voices when in dead channel
en.NALES_SETTING_NO_DEAD_ROLE_ON_DEATH: I don't want to get a role when I die
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT_AVAILABLE:
Hold #CROUCH for role explanations.
Power available in {0} seconds
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TELEPORTER_NO_BEA:
Hold #CROUCH for role explanations.
#SECONDARYROLEPOWER to place a beacon
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TELEPORTER_BEACON:
Hold #CROUCH for role explanations.
#SECONDARYROLEPOWER to teleport to your beacon
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_CARABINEER_LOADED:
Hold #CROUCH for role explanations.
Rifle reloaded in {0}s
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_CARABINEER_UNLOAD:
Hold #CROUCH for role explanations.
Rifle not loaded
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_MERCHANT_DELIVERY:
Hold #CROUCH for role explanations.
Delivery in progress
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_HUNTER: Hunter (elite villager): {0} to aim with your rifle, then {1} to fire. After the first shot you will have to find a <color=green>bullet</color> and use it {2} to reload. You cannot move while the rifle is out.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ALCHEMIST: Alchemist (elite villager): You know the effects of each potion. {0} to <color=green>transform</color> a loot item into a <color=green>white potion</color> which heals the drinker and grants them a random positive effect, shorter than a regular potion.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_PROTECTOR: Protector (elite villager): You can protect {0} other players, or yourself {1}, against Wolf attacks until the next meeting (3 seconds cast time). Each player can only protected once per game.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_DISCIPLE: Disciple (elite villager): {0} to move your Beacon to your position. If you're attacked by a wolf while having at least 100% charge, you're safely teleported to your Beacon and the wolf is stunned. While active, transformed Wolves see you as a different player.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_INQUISITOR: Inquisitor (elite villager): Outside meetings, {0} to add the target to your suspects list (max {1} suspects at once). In meetings, you can choose {2} a suspect (consumes 100% charge): if they killed someone since yesterday, the flame is red. Otherwise, it's blue.the die.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_HOWLER: Howler: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to use your power (#COOLDOWN cooldown): <color=green>in human form</color>, you increase the range of your voice and slow nearby players as long as you speak.<color=red>In Wolf form</color>, you stun all players in human form.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ALCOHOLIC: Brewer: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to change your item into a potion ({COOLDOWN cooldown). Potions have a more beneficial effect on you (negative -> neutral, neutral -> positive). You can also pick up and drink potions <color=red>in Wolf form</color> and they will heal you (but have no other effect).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SPRINTER: Sprinter: <color=green>In human form</color>, with at least 50% health, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to briefly accelerate at the cost of hunger (unless you're a Wolf). In addition, <color=red>if you're a Wolf</color>, <color=red>in Wolf form</color>, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to briefly sprint (#COOLDOWN cooldown).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_INFECTED: Infected: If a Wolf kills you, he forcibly untransforms after a delay. #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to use your power (#COOLDOWN cooldown): <color=green>in human form</color>, you remove most negative effects from yourself; <color=red>in Wolf form</color>, you make nearby players fart, even through walls.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TELEPORTER: Teleporter: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to create an invisible beacon at your position. Then, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to teleport to the beacon (#CAST delay, #COOLDOWN cooldown). This will destroy the beacon.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ENGINEER: Engineer: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to create a random non-potion item (#COOLDOWN cooldown). In addition you are less affected by negative gadgets (traps, smoke bombs, grenades, gas) and you break locks faster.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_STEALTHER: Stealther: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to use your power (#COOLDOWN cooldown). <color=green>In human form</color>, you're invisible and with silent footsteps (7s), but are unable to run. <color=red>In Wolf form</color>, you're visible but do not cause the fear effect (15s).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_POLITICIAN: Politician: Once per day, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to secretly mark a target who's in human form: they will be unable to talk or vote during the next meeting. Can only be used once per player. In addition, <color=green>if you're not a Wolf or Traitor</color> and are voted, someone else dies instead.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_METABOLIC: Metabolic: Food heals you more, negative effects have reduced duration and positive effects have increased duration. <color=red>If you're a Wolf</color>, during daytime, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to secretly mark someone and starve them when the night comes (#COOLDOWN cooldown).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ILLUSIONIST: Illusionist: <color=green>If you're not a Wolf</color>, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to blind ALL wolves in Wolf form. <color=red>If you're a Wolf</color> #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to shuffle the apparence of all non-transformed players. Both powers have a #COOLDOWN cooldown.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SHERIF: Sherif: <color=green>if you're not a Wolf</color>, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER on player contact: if they're an <color=red>enemy of the Villagers</color>, they die; otherwise, YOU die. <color=red>If you're a Wolf</color>, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to become <color>more resistant to bullets</color> for 10 seconds. #COOLDOWN cooldown.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_GAMBLER: Trickster: <color=green>In human form</color>, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to switch your target's position with a random player's position. The target is also <color=green>healed</color>.<color=red>In Wolf form</color>, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to switch yourself with a random player.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_MEDIUM: Medium: You're noticed whenever a player dies. You can, <color=red>once only</color>, consult #SECONDARYROLEPOWER a corpse to get a list of its potential killers. In addition, <color=red>if you're a Wolf</color>, you know the secondary role of all players.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ASTRAL: Astral: You can send your spirit outside your body #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to scout the surroundings. <color=green>In human form</color>, your health decreases depending on the distance; <color=red>in Wolf form</color>, you're very fast and your health does not decrease.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_RANGER: Ranger: You can hear the heartbeat of nearby transformed Wolves and see them on your minimap, and you also see their footprints (in <color=red>red</color>). Also, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to spend #CAST looking for footprints left by other players (they're <color=green>blue</color>).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SCAVENGER: Scavenger: You start with a <color=green>Lock, Diamond or Grenade</color>. In addition, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER on a corpse to use your power (#COOLDOWN cooldown): <color=green>In human form</color>, you heal a bit and get an item (max 1 interaction per corpse). <color=red>In Wolf form</color>, you eat it and heal yourself.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_BLUE_MAGE: Blue Mage: You start with a <color=green>random scroll</color>. In addition, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to inflict your target with the last potion or scroll effect you've received or given. The cooldown depends on the effect, and some effects won't work or will last shorter on transformed Wolves.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ACTOR: Actor: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to fall and feign death. Then, #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to get up. In this state you cannot see anything but you have still hear, and if you're in <color=red>Wolf form</color> you lose health much slower and do not generate a fear effect.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SCRIBE: Scribe: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to create a random scroll (#COOLDOWN cooldown). If you already hold a scroll, you will instead randomly change its effect (#SECONDCOOLDOWN cooldown).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_CARABINEER: Carabineer: You have a rifle - #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to bring it out. It <color=red>knocks its target back</color>. Targets in human form are also <color=red>stunned</color>, while targets in Wolf form are <color=red>slowed</color>. The rifle <color=green>automatically reloads itself</color> after #COOLDOWN.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_FORGER: Forger: You can see which item the players in human form hold, and you can use your power #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to <color=green>copy</color> the item if you're far from the player, or <color=red>steal</color> it if you're close. The cooldown is #COOLDOWN if you copy, or #SECONDCOOLDOWN if you steal.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_IMITATOR: Imitator: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to choose a secondary role to use today. When the day ends, you turn back into an Imitator and can choose another secondary role.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_MERCHANT: Merchant: You can see and loot special <color=yellow>coins</color> that are displayed on the minimap. The arrow also points to the nearest coin. #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to display the shop where you can spend your coins. <color=red>There is a #DELAY seconds delay before delivery</color>.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TELEPATH: Telepath: #SECONDARYROLEPOWER to toggle telepathy with the other Telepath, #PARTNER, who's an ally. While active he can hear you at any distance, but you do not hear other players and they do not hear you.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_VILLAGE_IDIOT: Village Idiot (solo role): Get voted to win. At night, your hunger depends on your <color=red>boredom</color>: collect and stay near other players to reduce it. You can <color=red>fake sabotaging</color> and, <color=red>once only</color>, <color=red>transform into a (harmless) Wolf</color>. If a Villager kills you when you're in human form, they also die.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TRAITOR: Traitor (special role): You're a human but you're sided with the Wolves. You don't count when determining Wolf victory.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_AGENT: Agent (solo role): Make sure the other Agent dies, then be amongst the last {0} survivors at a meeting. You can identify Wolves and the other Agent. At night you can eliminate {1} the other Agent, which also makes you fast and invisible for a few seconds.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SPY: Spy (solo role): Win by reaching 100% Spying and surviving until the next meeting. The target is colored <color=red>red</color> in the list and is visible on the minimap. You spy faster if the target is visible and / or you're immobile. During meetings, your progress is displayed to everyone.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SCIENTIST: Scientist (solo role): Win by joining a meeting with 100% Research. Research increases by staying near a transformed Wolf. It increases faster the more risks you're taking. You can see all transformed Wolves on your minimap. You can create {0} gadgets ({1} seconds cooldown).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_LOVER_VILLAGER: Lover Villager (duo role): Survive with the Lover Wolf until only 4 players are alive in a meeting. You can <color=green>communicate through telepathy</color> {0} (private channel). You get hungry at a constant rate and only the Lover Wolf's kills can feed you. Your presence reduces the visibility of all transformed Wolves.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_LOVER_WOLF: Lover Wolf (duo role): Survive with the Lover Villager until only 4 players are alive in a meeting. You can <color=green>communicate through telepathy</color> {0} (private channel). You must get kills in order to feed the Lover Villager! In Wolf form you can also kill transformed Wolves.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_BEAST: The Beast (solo role): Mark {0} all living players ({1} seconds cooldown). They are not aware of the Mark. Then, next night you will become the Beast: a large, fast and tough Wolf who can kill even regular Wolves: kill enough victims to win!
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_BOUNTY_HUNTER: Bounty Hunter (solo role): Win by hitting {0} targets. When receiving a target, your gun is reloaded, you can see them on the minimap, and they are <color=red>paralyzed</color> when you next take out your gun. Your gun is silent and your bullets make their target asleep.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_VOODOO: Voodoo (solo role): Win by being at least as numerous (including your Zombies) as the others, at a meeting. You can <color=green>reanimate</color> {0} corpses (except Wolves) into Zombies, which are revived at night and can kill people in human form to reduce your reanimation cooldown.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SMUGGLER: Smuggler (solo role): You must loot a certain amount each day to stay alive! Once you have collected enough, you will be hunted after the next meeting. Survive until nightfall to win - but anyone can kill you!
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ZOMBIE: Zombie (solo role): SERVE THE MASTER. Win by having the majority at a meeting with the Voodoo. You're dead during the day but revive every time night falls. You can kill {0} players in human form to reduce the Voodoo's cooldown, and sacrifice yourself to stun {0} a Wolf.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_NECROMANCER: Necromancer: {0} to mark a corpse. The player <color=red>becomes a Wolf and takes Wolf form immediately</color>. You can then resurrect {1} him as a mute Wolf by consuming your charge. You gain charge while in Wolf form.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_DECEIVER: Deceiver: During the night, illusions of a Wolf transformation (noise and threat) are automatically created at random times and locations. In addition, {0} on your target to secretly inflict them with a random handicap during the next meeting ({1} seconds cooldown).
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SABOTEUR: Saboteur: You can trap gadgets and potions on the ground or held by another player. {0} to take, {1} to trap. {2} seconds cooldown. Items are also more visible for you - but don't talk about this!
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TRACKER: Tracker: In Wolf form, {0} to toggle tracking. With this effect, you're slower but you can sense the proximity of nearby prey: the more red your vision, the closer they are.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_WARLOCK: Warlock: {0} to choose a player: your <color=green>human form</color> takes their appearance (noted in <color=red>red</color> in the players list). Also, {1} to secretly curse your target ({2} cooldown). They will transform into a harmless Wolf during next night, which also shows them on your minimap.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_POSSESSOR: Possessor : {0} on a target, then stay close until he's <color=green>marked</color>: you can then <color=red>possess</color> {1} him to see through his eyes. If you transform {2} while possessing him, you <color=green>take his place</color> but you won't be able to untransform this night and will be unable to mark him again.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_BOMBER: Bomber: Collect to build timed bombs. You can then secretly give one {0} to a player. Its timer will trigger shortly after the beginning of the next phase, but it can then be given to another player before exploding! They wound the target and make them glow.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SEER: Seer: You know everyone's health status. Also, during meetings, you can try to guess {0} a villager's job: if you're right, they die shortly after and your Wolf form is empowered during the next day; if you're wrong, you will get hungry faster instead.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_POACHER: Poacher: You have a rifle with a zoom. Its shots make <color=green>very little noise</color> and inflict the target with a tracker: wolves can see them on their minimap and hear a sound when nearby. The rifle is automatically recharged after each meeting but can also be recharged with a bullet.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_RITUALIST: Ritualist: Charge your power by <color=green>being near other players</color>. The more players and the closer they are, the faster it charges. At 100% you can <color=green>invoke a ritual</color> {0} that lets you choose an effect to apply to ALL players in human form.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_PREDATOR: Predator: Your Wolf form generates the fear effect from less far. During the day, {0} to choose a prey for today: <color=red>they're warned</color>, but you <color=green>know your distance to them</color>, you hear their heartbeat when you're close, and you get a <color=green>buff</color> (speed and stealth) if you kill them. If they're the Hunter, you also take less damage from their bullets.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SNEAK: Sneak: During daytime, {0} to move your invisible beacon to your position: untransforming silently teleports you to it and makes you invisible, fast and silent, and the fear effect persists where you vanished. At night, you can choose {0} to make your transformation slower but silent.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_PEASANT: Peasant: Charge your power by <color=green>being near other players</color>. With at least 25% you can use it {0} to crouch and become <color=green>invisible to transformed Wolves</color>. Deactivates when charge reaches 0% or when you stop crouching.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_EXORCIST: Exorcist: Collect to obtain your power, then {0} to place an <color=green>invisible detector</color> at your position ({1}s to create it). When a Wolf gets near, he's <color=red>exorcised</color> for {2} seconds: deaf, obscured vision, and you see him on your minimap. Detectors last longer the further from the meeting point.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_FORENSICS: Forensics: You can scan {0} a corpse to learn the main role (villager, wolf, traitor, spy...) thay had ({1} seconds cooldown). Also, the Seer cannot kill you by guessing you as a Forensics.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_AVENGER: Avenger: When your power is charged, you can kill {1} a player who's in human form, or stun {1} a transformed Wolf. Your power charges when a transformed Wolf is near, with a bonus if he kills someone.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_INVESTIGATOR: Investigator: Go to the places showed on your minimap to progress your investigation. At 100% you learn that a player is <color=green>not a Wolf</color>. Warning: he may be a traitor or solo role! These players are colored <color=green> in the list.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SURVIVALIST: Survivalist: Charge your power by getting the <color=green>hints</color> other players sometimes leave, then {0} on a player to allow him to be <color=green>saved</color> by another player if he's attacked by a Wolf. You also start with this effect on yourself.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_PRIEST: Priest: Collect to obtain your power then {0} during the day to protect your target. The first time they are attacked by a Wolf today, they will be protected (but lose their item) and the Wolf will be knocked back.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SUMMONER: Summoner: Charge your power by being <color=red>low on health</color>. At night, with at least 50% charge, you can summon the <color=green>spirit</color> {0} of the Villager who died last: it is controlled by its player and can attack a Wolf to <color=red>damage him</color> and <color=red>slow him down</color>. Spirit duration and speed depend on the charge.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_DETECTIVE: Mentalist: {0} to start <color=green>investigating</color> the target (except Elite villagers). Stay close until you reach 100% charge to gain a <color=green>useful information</color>. Maximum 2 detections on the same target. {1} to check your past notes.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SCOUT: Scout: Collect to build a radar then {0} to place it at your position. It <color=green>detects transformed Wolves</color> in a large radius: they appear on your minimap, show an arrow at your feet, as well as a sound. Active at night only and lasts longer when further from the meeting point.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_MAGICIAN: Magician: Collect to charge your power then {0} to create a crystal (only visible by you) at your position. Then {1} to create moving illusions from all crystals. Only transformed Wolves can see them, and they blind Wolves that attack them.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_MYSTIC: Mystic: Your power charges when below 50% life. At night, {0} to activate your power ({1}s cast time, lasts {2} seconds): you become able to banish {3} transformed Wolves for {4} seconds. They know when an empowered Mystic is close.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_AVATAR: Avatar: <color=red>If you die, the current night is longer and all Wolves are empowered for the rest of the game!</color> You can see nearby transformed Wolves on the <color=green>minimap</color>, you get a <color=green>Priest protection</color> each night, you get hungry more slowly, and you can use your health to <color=green>create {0} a random item</color>.
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ACTION_WARNING: Actions in <color=purple>purple</color> have a visible animation!
en.NALES_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ELITE_BULLET: Elite Villager: use a <color=green>bullet</color> to charge your power
en.NALES_UI_CUSTOMIZATION_DESCRIPTION:
{0} to cycle through options.
Left-click / right-click (or equivalent) to change.
en.NALES_UI_VERSION_CHECK_MOD_MISSING: {0} does not have the New Roles mod!
en.NALES_UI_VERSION_CHECK_MOD_OK: Everyone has New Roles with the correct version!
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_SHOW_DESCRIPTION: Hold CROUCH key to get a role description
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_MAGIC_SCROLL: To use a scroll, {0} on a player
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_PHASING_DIAMOND: The diamond temporarily makes you fast and invisible for 3 seconds
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_GRENADE: The grenade causes knockback when exploding
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_SLEEPING_GAS: Gas: place it (3 seconds) then detonate to release gas
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_MIDAS: The Midas effect increases your loot and allows you to petrify a target
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_ASSASSIN: The Assassin effect allows you to kill a human or stun a Wolf
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_STINKING: The Stinking effect slows nearby players, with a longer range on Wolves
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_CLAIRVOYANCE: The Clairvoyance effect shows all players on your minimap
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_TRUESIGHT: Truesight: you have nightvision and ignore visual illusions
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_AUDITION_PLUS: Audition+ : you hear from further away and see victims and on the minimap
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_ENERGIZED: Energized : your power recharges faster, or you regenerate health
en.NALES_UI_TUTORIAL_EFFECT_WOLF_RECUPERATE: Wolf: Stay immobile to heal yourself
en.NALES_UI_RESURRECT_NOTIFICATION: Raised as a Wolf! Go kill people!
en.NALES_UI_ANGEL_INFO: You are now a Guardian Angel!
en.NALES_UI_PREDATOR_TARGET_WARNING: You are the Predator Wolf's Prey!
en.NALES_UI_SMUGGLER_HUNTED: Anyone can kill you! Survive until the night!
en.NALES_UI_POSSESSOR_POSSESSED: The Possessor wolf has possessed you!
en.NALES_UI_DETECTIVE_ONE_IS_EVIL: There's at least one <color=red>enemy of the Villagers</color> among {0}.
en.NALES_UI_DETECTIVE_NO_TRANSFORM_OR_SABOT: {0} did not transform and has not sabotaged anything yesterday.
en.NALES_UI_DETECTIVE_POSITION_AT_MID_NIGHT: {0} was on the position indicated on the minimap at the middle of the previous night.
en.NALES_UI_DETECTIVE_DIFFERENT_SIDES: {0} and {1} are not on the same side.
en.NALES_UI_DETECTIVE_HAS_ONE_OF_THESE_ROLE: {0} a l'un de ces pouvoirs ou rÃ´le solo : {1}.
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_HOWLER: During his power, his voice has more range and stuns nearby players
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_HOWLER_WOLF: In Wolf form, can use his power to stun all players
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ALCOHOLIC: Can change his item into a potion. Potions have more beneficial effects
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ALCOHOLIC_W: Can change his item into a potion and drink them in Wolf form to heal
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SPRINTER: Can sacrifice health to sprint during a few seconds
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_SPRINTER_WO: In Wolf form, can sprint to run very fast
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_INFECTED: Can remove negative effects, and forces a Wolf who kills him to untransform after a delay
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_INFECTED_WO: In Wolf form, can cause all nearby players to fart
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TELEPORTER: Can create a beacon then teleport after a short delay
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TELEPORTER_: Can create a beacon then teleport after a short delay
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ENGINEER: Can create gadgets and is also more effective against their effects
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ENGINEER_WO: Can create gadgets and is also more effective against their effects
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_STEALTHER: Can become invisible and muffle his footsteps
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_STEALTHER_W: In Wolf form, can prevent players from hearing the Wolf music
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_POLITICIAN: Can stun his target during the next meeting; cannot be voted (if Villager)
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_POLITICIAN_: Can stun his target during the next meeting
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_METABOLIC: Food heals him more, effects have better durations
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_METABOLIC_W: Can curse a target to make them lose health quickly during the night
en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_ILLUSIONIST: Can briefly blind all transformed wolves, at any distance
Can shuffle the human appearance of all players

en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_CARABINEER_: Has a rifle that knocks back and stuns its target

en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_FORGER_WOLF: Can see which item the players hold, and copy or steal them

en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_IMITATOR_WO: Can pick a new secondary role each day

en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_DETECTIVE: Can investigate someone to learn useful information

en.NALES_DRAFT_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_AVATAR: Has multiple advantages, but Wolves are empowered if he dies
en.NALES_DRAFT_MAIN_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_TRAITO: Help the Wolves to win with them
